rooms.description: The entrance area that complies with Vastu principles by aligning the door towards the east for auspicious entry.
A spacious modern living room with large windows on the south wall to maximize natural light, adhering to Vastu norms.
An open dining space integrated into the living area, designed for social gatherings.
Modern kitchen with an island counter and proper ventilation on the north wall per Vastu guidelines.
Spacious master bedroom featuring a walk-in closet, east-facing windows for positive energy.
Additional bedroom optimized for privacy with south-east orientation.
Smaller bedroom suited for guest or secondary use.
Functional bathroom with water element considerations in alignment with Vastu.
